row.name: UC4RB_AWS_ICMP_TYPE#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_AWS_ICMP_TYPEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="ICMP Type" tooltip="For ICMP: The ICMP type and code. Use the format type:code, where both are integers. You can use -1 for the type or code to mean all types or all codes. Condition: Required if specifying icmp (or the equivalent number) for the protocol." upper="0" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>

Use the format type:code, where both are integers. You can use -1 for the type or code to mean all types or all codes. Condition: Required if specifying icmp (or the equivalent number) for the protocol.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties> </text>

row.name: UC4RB_AWS_PORT_RANGE#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_AWS_PORT_RANGEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Port Range" tooltip="For TCP or UDP: The range of ports to allow. You can specify -1 to mean all ports (i.e. port range 0-65535)." upper="0" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>

Valid values: A single integer or a range (min-max). You can specify -1 to mean all ports (i.e. port range 0-65535).</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties> </text>

row.name: UC4RB_AWS_RULE_TYPE#
row.xui: <dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="" id="UC4RB_AWS_RULE_TYPEs.00" nl="1" text="Rule Type" tooltip="Specifies that any traffic matching the rule is allowed or denied." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.VARA.RULE_TYPE</entry> <entry name="text">Rule Type</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_AWS_RULE_TYPEs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Specifies that any traffic matching the rule is allowed or denied.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties> </dynradiogroup>
